pull.title: test: Run all benchmarks in the sanity check
pull.body:
It is unclear why not all benchmarks are run, given that:

* they only run as a sanity check (fastest version)
* no one otherwise runs them, not even CI
* issues have been missed due to this

events.message: test: Run all benchmarks in the sanity check

events.body: For reference, in the two CI `DEBUG=1` configurations, the bench part seems to take 3x the time. Though, this should be fine, given the motivation in the pull description, and also the fact that there are similarly slow other tests.
